text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Commission" means the Commission on Indian Affairs.
"Community" means a tribe, band, group, or clan.

section.section: "Indian" means an individual or community that is, or whose members are, descended from a tribe that inhabited North America before European contact.
"Indian" includes a Native American Indian, a North American Indian, an American Indian, and an aboriginal American.
